channel.title: [RSC NiTRO] Recruiting Thread - Must Check
channel.description:
This isn't a Repeated Topic, The last Time Vrunk deleted my posts because i couldn't delete them i posted in a wrong section
Hey all many of you dont know me but i'm a Programmer of games like Super Mario Online and i wanted to start a RuneScape Classic Server, i'm pretty active the way people doesnt have to wait a WEEK or a MONTH for an update.
I'm kinda new to Java since i just started but i'm used to some programming languages so I'm wishing to use all my skills with you guys to make a Really Great PK Server
[b]Currently The Features we will have:[/b]
Dragon Armour (Recolouring) Music into the game!! Awesome GUI! News & AutoUpdater Mario Bros As as Character (wtf) Mini Games WebClient(Hopefully with some Java Help)
[b]The Staff needed atm:[/b]
Java programmers Map & NPC Developers
[size=16pt][url=http://www.mixpod.com/playlist/20332747]Clic here to listen to the Custom Menu Music![/url][/size]
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/5466/nitroad.png[/img]
[size=14pt]This is your Chance to join an Active Project, Post or PM me to Join The Crew[/size] You will get the credits & a Stable possition at RSC Nitro[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2009, 09:47:07 am[/size][hr]
[size=14pt][b]UPDATE APRIL 6[/b][/size]
[b]New Pictures :eek::[/b]
[img]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/1990/nitroad2.png[/img]

item.title: [RSC NiTRO] Recruiting Thread - Must Check
item.dc:creator: @xT-e xT-e
item.description:
@xT-e wrote:

I was haste. I did, but then i left shortly after.
I went and made haste pk, which lasted a month but hit 30 active players.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSC NiTRO] Recruiting Thread - Must Check
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“xT-e, post:12, topic:271472”][quote author=adu link=topic=358228.msg2736554#msg2736554 date=1239073664]

Lynx’s source? Ha, i was the person who developed all the ideas behind the training spots, the armour, and future ideas. I was haste, the mod. I was first to max str on it too.

Lynx’s source was XPK, mine was xtreme-pk. =]
[/quote]

my bad, people started cofusing me with it after i left.
Why not start from scratch though, then you can atelast claim you did all the work.[/quote]

I think i remember you form XPK, if im not wrong you were mod then got promoted to admin right?
I was Adam, the admin on that server

Read full topic

item.title: [RSC NiTRO] Recruiting Thread - Must Check
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

Those are just ideas so far. This has been under development for a day, and it’s got some progress. We will be going through alot of changes, and might even use Xtreme Pk’s Source. (Unreleased)

-Kozy

Read full topic

item.title: [RSC NiTRO] Recruiting Thread - Must Check
item.dc:creator: @xT-e xT-e
item.description:
@xT-e wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:6, topic:271472”]xT-e did you read before you posted??

He said in the first post and then repeated in the fourth post that he will have:

Dragon Armour (Recolouring)
Music into the game!!
Awesome GUI!
News & AutoUpdater
Mario Bros As as Character (wtf)
Mini Games
WebClient(Hopefully with some Java Help)

jesus…[/quote]

drag armour? not new.
music? it’s just adding a mp3 player into the client
news? everyone has that
mini games, same ol same ol.
webclient, many go around.

i said for the long run, these may be interesting for maybe 2 weeks, but is there anything substantialy different from other servers? no.

Read full topic
